flavorText: Its strings are wayward threads of fate.

foreignData.flavorText: Ihre Saiten sind eigenwillige Fäden des Schicksals.
foreignData.name: Berauschende Lyra
foreignData.text:
Du kannst bestimmen, die Berauschende Lyra während deines Enttappsegments nicht zu enttappen.
{X}, {T}: Tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl mit Stärke X oder weniger. Sie enttappt nicht während des Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers, solange die Berauschende Lyra getappt bleibt.

foreignData.flavorText: Sus cuerdas son los hilos caprichosos del destino.
foreignData.name: Lira cautivadora
foreignData.text:
Puedes elegir no enderezar la Lira cautivadora durante tu paso de enderezar.
{X}, {T}: Gira la criatura objetivo con fuerza de X o menos. No se endereza durante el paso de enderezar de su controlador mientras la Lira cautivadora permanezca girada.

foreignData.flavorText: Ses cordes sont d'imprévisibles fils du destin.
foreignData.name: Lyre enchanteresse
foreignData.text:
Vous pouvez choisir de ne pas dégager la Lyre enchanteresse pendant votre étape de dégagement.
{X}, {T} : Engagez une créature ciblée de force inférieure ou égale à X. Elle ne se dégage pas pendant l'étape de dégagement de son contrôleur tant que la Lyre enchanteresse reste engagée.

foreignData.flavorText: Le sue corde sono i fili mutevoli del fato.
foreignData.name: Lira Ammaliante
foreignData.text:
Puoi scegliere di non STAPpare la Lira Ammaliante durante il tuo STAP.
{X}, {T}: TAPpa una creatura bersaglio con forza pari o inferiore a X. Non STAPpa durante lo STAP del suo controllore fintanto che la Lira Ammaliante rimane TAPpata.

foreignData.flavorText: その絃は気紛れな運命の糸。
foreignData.name: 幻惑する竪琴
foreignData.text:
あなたは、あなたのアンタップ・ステップに幻惑する竪琴をアンタップしないことを選んでもよい。
{X}, {T}：パワーがＸ以下のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。幻惑する竪琴がタップ状態であり続けているかぎり、それはそれのコントローラーのアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。

foreignData.flavorText: 그것의 현은 다루기 힘든 운명의 끈들로 되어 있다.
foreignData.name: 넋을 빼앗는 리라
foreignData.text:
당신은 당신의 언탭단에 넋을 빼앗는 리라를 언탭하지 않을 수 있다.
{X}, {T}: 공격력이 X 이하인 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 탭한다. 그 생물은 넋을 빼앗는 리라가 탭된 채로 있는 한 그 조종자의 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Seus fios são linhas esfiapadas do destino.
foreignData.name: Lira Hipnotizante
foreignData.text:
Você pode escolher não desvirar Lira Hipnotizante durante sua etapa de desvirar.
{X}, {T}: Vire a criatura alvo com poder igual ou inferior a X. Ela não desvira durante a etapa de desvirar de seu controlador enquanto Lira Hipnotizante permanecer virada.

foreignData.flavorText: Ее струны — это непредсказуемые нити судьбы.
foreignData.name: Чарующая Лира
foreignData.text:
Вы можете решить не разворачивать Чарующую Лиру во время вашего шага разворота.
{X}, {T}: поверните целевое существо с силой не более X. Оно не разворачивается во время шага разворота контролирующего его игрока, пока Чарующая Лира остается повернутой.

foreignData.flavorText: 这把琴以命运的任性脉络为弦。
foreignData.name: 摄魂竖琴
foreignData.text:
你可以选择于你的重置步骤中不重置摄魂竖琴。
{X}，{T}：横置目标力量等于或小于X的生物。于摄魂竖琴持续横置的时段内，该生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

foreignData.flavorText: 這把琴以命運的任性脈絡為弦。
foreignData.name: 攝魂豎琴
foreignData.text:
你可以選擇於你的重置步驟中不重置攝魂豎琴。
{X}，{T}：橫置目標力量等於或小於X的生物。於攝魂豎琴持續橫置的時段內，該生物於其操控者的重置步驟中不能重置。

name: Entrancing Lyre
originalText:
You may choose not to untap Entrancing Lyre during your untap step.
{X}, {T}: Tap target creature with power X or less. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Entrancing Lyre remains tapped.

rulings.text: Entrancing Lyre’s activated ability can target a creature that’s already tapped. That creature won’t untap for as long as Entrancing Lyre remains tapped.
If Entrancing Lyre leaves the battlefield, it’s no longer tapped, so the creature is free to untap as usual.

If Entrancing Lyre becomes untapped before its activated ability resolves, the target creature is tapped, but it can untap as usual. This is true even if Entrancing Lyre becomes tapped again before the activated ability resolves.
If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Entrancing Lyre’s ability tries to resolve, the ability won’t resolve. The creature isn’t tapped and can untap as usual.
If the target creature’s power is increased after Entrancing Lyre’s ability has resolved, it remains affected and won’t untap as usual.
Once Entrancing Lyre is no longer tapped, the creature won’t immediately become untapped.

text:
You may choose not to untap Entrancing Lyre during your untap step.
{X}, {T}: Tap target creature with power X or less. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Entrancing Lyre remains tapped.
